entries.meaning: (inorganic chemistry) any salt of chromic acid; in solution the yellow chromate anion (CrO42-) is in equilibrium with the orange dichromate anion (Cr2O72−), the relative amount of each ion depending on the pH; they are both very powerful oxidizing agents

verbs.description: chromate (third-person singular simple present chromates, present participle chromating, simple past and past participle chromated)

entries.meaning: To treat with a chromate solution
